prop.name: orderItemStatus
prop.desc: The current status of the order item.

prop.name: orderQuantity
prop.desc: The number of the item ordered. If the property is not set, assume the quantity is one.

prop.name: orderDelivery
prop.desc: The delivery of the parcel related to this order or order item.

prop.name: orderItemNumber
prop.desc: The identifier of the order item.
